abstract: This chapter reproduces the English translation by B. Seckler of the paper byVapnik and Chervonenkis inwhich they gave proofs for the innovative results they had obtained in a draft form in July 1966 and announced in 1968 in their note in Soviet Mathematics Doklady. The paper was first published in Russian as Vapnik V. N. and Qervonenkis.16(2), 264-279 (1971). Â© Springer International Publishing Switzerland 2015. All rights are reserved.
